channel.title: Currently-Reading on Strat
channel.description: Recent content in Currently-Reading on Strat

item.title: The Word For World Is Forest
item.description:
Seems like Ursula K. Le Guin is subverting the old school military science fiction trope of humans going around killing “aliens” with the humans doing the killing framed as the good guys who we’re supposed to be rooting for. Maybe colonialism is bad?

Let’s see how this goes.

item.title: Berserk
item.description: Gritty medieval fantasy manga with fantastic art and a story with weight.
